<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15257](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15257.html) (Scripts and tools: Bump flake8 to 3.7.7 by Empact)
* [#13728](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13728.html) (lint: Run the CI lint stage on mac by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Fun fact - tinyformat has this fixed upstream:

https://github.com/c42f/tinyformat/blob/4d03ee3d04c33c158bd261598ebde265885a6d9f/tinyformat.h#L496
